SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT FORMAT(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1, 0) AS rn, re_num, re_member, r.pro_num, re_image, re_image2, re_content, re_stars, re_date, p.pro_name, p.pro_imagefilename, p.pro_color, p.pro_size FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) R, review r JOIN productall p ON r.pro_num = p.pro_num WHERE re_date > 0
AND re_member LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberId}, '%')
AND p.pro_num like CONCAT('%',#{proNum},'%')
) AS a WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{section,jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*200 + (#{pageNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*20+1 AND (#{section,jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*200 + #{pageNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}*20 ORDER BY re_date DESC

SELECT count(re_num) FROM review WHERE re_num > 0
AND re_member LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberId}, '%')
AND pro_num like CONCAT('%',#{proNum},'%')
